{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$3.3M in 2021-2022** on contracts with DLS TECHNOLOGY.

Across 82 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 10 have at least one amendment (12%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 80% and the average number of amendments was 1.2. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$775.4K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 1.24 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$176.1K. The longest contract was 5.17 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$1.3M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
